entry.title: A New Start
entry.content:
This is a nice day!!!

After half a dayâ€™s hard work, my blog is successfully included by baidu and google,and I add some new features to my blog for attracting more people to visit.

As we all know,photo is a good way to look back our experience,so I specially add Photo to my blog.I change the background of my blog,making it not monotonous.The big change is that my blog language is changed to Engelish and I begin to write blog in English ,thanks to my classmate Uncle_drewâ€™s idea,and thanks for his blog ,I learn a lot from it. Thank you @ https://cndrew.cn/

Lastly,I sincerely hope that I can insist writing blog .

C++
